content.description: P.1 Goes at 5.7 follow the crack if you want the intended route. Follow the face to the right at closer to 5.8 if you want a more sporty start. Needs some chain anchors added for now there is no good way to clean on this without walking off.P. 2 Goes at heady 5.9. Wonderful movement in the middle to the end. Its recommended to rap off from P.2 with 2 routes to the bottom as the anchors on P.1 Dont lend themselves to rapping off and require a walk off that is pretty dirty.
content.location: After getting to the parking spot walk out for 5 to 10 minutes following the trail west. Their is a cairn at the base of the route. If you get to the creek you have gone too far.Â

content.description: Just north of FMI mine in Morenci is a mecca of beautiful cliffs. While lots of rock is wild and begging to be climbed there are multiple gems here already in place including The Old Rusty Bolt a 2 pitch 5.9. This is not a destination as of now but the potential for lots of development is here.
